# Alok - Full Stack Developer Portfolio

## About
Alok is a Full Stack Developer & UI/UX Enthusiast based in San Francisco.
He builds digital experiences with code and creativity.

## Skills
- Frontend: React, Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion
- Backend: Node.js, Python, PostgreSQL, Supabase
- Tools: Docker, Git, VS Code, Figma
